description: The unit aims to enhance students' communicative competence in the four macro skills (speaking, listening, reading and writing) from the beginning level towards the intermediate level. Students also learn to read and write 73 newly introduced kanji and compound words that consist of new and prerequisite kanji.
prerequisites: JAPN2021 and JAPN2022 or JAPN2023 or Year 12 Japanese or equivalent; spent less than six months in Japan
